title: Riot grants wishes I do believe.
body:
I was really hoping for a Victorious Tristana when they announced it was going to be for marksmen. I look and see it's for Sivir. I was really sad and also mad. Why no Trist? So I said to myself 'Fine. Then Tris better get a Legendary skin next year.' And what do my eyes find months later? A skin teaser for Dragon Trainer Tristana. My God. Thank you Riot. I am perfectly fine with Sivir getting that skin.  Us Tristana's are gonna be getting a Legendary.
{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

replies.body: I can only ever hope to get it T-T
